This Activity for playing a song and we add Recycler view to handel the songs and there component

ExoPlayer is an open source project ExoPlayer standard audio and video components are built on Android MediaCodec API, which was released in Android 4.1 (API level 16) ExoPlayer supports features like Dynamic adaptive streaming over HTTP (DASH) , SmoothStreaming and Common Encryption, which are not supported by MediaPlayer. It designed to be easy to customize and extend.
